lead_paragraph: KAUFMAN--Isaac. Congregation Shaaray Tefila records with deep sorrow the death of our cherished member. Heartfelt condolences are extended to his wife, Sonia and their family. May God comfort his loved ones and may Isaac's memory be for blessing. Rabbi Deborah A. Hirsch Michael Starr, President 1/3
